DOCNAME: CASE OF HAPESHIS AND OTHERS v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants , who are siblings , were born in DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively . The first applicant ( who is a NORP and NORP citizen ) lives in GPE ; the second , third and fourth applicants all reside in GPE . The second applicant is a NORP citizen , while the third and fourth applicants are NORP citizens .
CARDINAL . On DATE , as the NORP troops were advancing , the applicants ' father left the village of ORG in LOC , where he owned the following immovable properties :
( a ) plot of land with trees in GPE ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE , area : hectares ( h. ) CARDINAL , decares ( d. ) QUANTITY ( m² ) CARDINAL ) ;
( b ) plot of land with trees in GPE ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE , area : h. CARDINAL , d. CARDINAL , m² CARDINAL ) ;
( c ) plot of land with trees in GPE ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE , area : h. CARDINAL , d. CARDINAL , m² CARDINAL ) ;
( d ) plot of land with trees in ORG ( plot nos . CARDINAL and CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE , area : d. CARDINAL , m² CARDINAL ) ;
( e ) plot of land with trees in Spati ( plot no . ORG , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE , area : d. CARDINAL , m² CARDINAL ) ;
( f ) plot of land with trees in ORG ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE , area : m² CARDINAL ) ;
( g ) plot of land with trees in ORG ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE , area : d. CARDINAL , m² CARDINAL ) ;
( h ) plot of land in PERSON ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL , registration no . DATE ; area : d. CARDINAL , m² CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . NORP In support to their claim that their father was the owner of the above - mentioned plots of land , the applicants submitted copies of the title deeds and of the relevant certificates of ownership .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants ' father tried to visit his property but was arrested by NORP soldiers . He was released on DATE , since he was a NORP citizen .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants ' father died . According to his will , dated DATE , the plot described under paragraph CARDINAL ( a ) above was to be inherited by the first applicant and the other plots were to be inherited by the CARDINAL applicants in equal shares . On DATE , Mr GPE was appointed as executor of the will of the applicants ' father . The applicants registered their titles with ORG on DATE . The first applicant tried , via the NORP consular authorities , to visit the properties at issue , but did not obtain permission .

CARDINAL . NORP In a letter of DATE , the applicants informed the ORG that GPE was planning to construct a highway at the edge of their properties and that an area of m² CARDINAL had been taken for this purpose . The applicants had not been consulted on the matter and no compensation had been offered to them .
